attributes.action: Remove VAT from the sale of Trees, tree guards & other tree planting products.
attributes.background: With the UK Parliament declaring an environment and climate emergency and new Government policy seeking to achieve carbon neutrality by 2050, why is the Government continuing to tax tree purchases and essential tree planting equipment? Remove VAT from these items and enable more trees to be planted.
